document_data.name: Rig-A-Mortice
document_data.mainbody: '''Rig-A-Mortice''' was a famous [[locksmith]] business in the city of [[Mirabar]] sometime in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The business was owned and operated by the [[dwarf]] [[Glengar Silverpalm]]. His brother, the [[fence]] [[Durdlan Silverpalm]], had a share in the business.
